description.value:
This ornate doorknob can open doors both material and metaphysical, revealing dreams and nightmares. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 34.

  • Armor You gain a +2 item bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock.
  • Weapon If you critically succeed at a Strike with the weapon, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] until the end of its next turn. The creature is then temporarily immune to being blinded in this way for 24 hours.
